title: Will Ford's New GT Live Up to Its Predecessors? - AFTER/DRIVE
description: Ford has officially launched its new Ford GT, somewhat secretly in Detroit a few weeks ago.  Spinelli talks with Mike and Zac from Classic Car Club Manhattan (past owners of three different Ford GT's) about whether the new one will live up to the legend of the old.
tags: 2017 Ford GT, racing, motorsport, Ford, GT40
